attributes.action: recognise Christopher Biggins in the New Years Honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A real national treasure, Christopher Biggins should be honoured. 

His varied career has seen him host gameshow 'On Safari', appear in 'Porridge' and 'The Rocky Horror Picture Show', and he has been crowned King of the Jungle on 'I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!' 

He is also well known for his performances in pantomime and his charity work.
